code: @Override public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     Message original = null.     if (exchange.getContext().isAllowUseOriginalMessage()) {         original = exchange.getUnitOfWork().getOriginalInMessage().     }     if (original == null) {         exchange.getIn().setHeader("HasOriginal", "false").     } else {         exchange.getIn().setHeader("HasOriginal", "true").         exchange.getIn().setHeader("OriginalBody", original.getBody()).         exchange.getIn().setHeader("OriginalExchangeId", original.getExchange().getExchangeId()).     } }
